thread.title: Oregon State Beavers football vs. Colorado Buffaloes: TV channel, start time, how to watch live stream
thread.title_full: Oregon State Beavers football vs. Colorado Buffaloes: TV channel, start time, how to watch live stream | OregonLive.com

author: Joel Odom | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Oregon State Beavers football vs. Colorado Buffaloes: TV channel, start time, how to watch live stream
text:
It's a clash of teams looking for their first Pac-12 victory of the season when the Oregon State Beavers take on the Colorado Buffaloes on Saturday night at Reser Stadium in Corvallis.
Will it be the Beavers or Buffaloes who emerge victorious?
Here's how to watch and follow the game:
What: Oregon State Beavers (2-4, 0-3 Pac-12) vs. Colorado Buffaloes (3-4, 0-3)
When: 7:30 p.m. PDT Saturday
Where: Reser Stadium, Corvallis. Capacity: 45,674.
TV channel: Pac-12 Network (Comcast 420/720, CenturyLink 687/1687 in Portland area; Dish 409; not available on DirecTV)
Commentators: Kevin Calabro (play-by-play), Yogi Roth (analyst), Lewis Johnson (sideline)
Radio: KEX (1190 AM), KEJO (1240 AM); Sirius 132; XM 198
Live stream: Cable and satellite customers who get Pac-12 Networks as part of their subscription can live stream the game via Pac-12 Now online , or through the Pac-12 Now app on their phone or tablet.
Live chat: Check out our live game chat at oregonlive.com/beavers for updates throughout the game.
Latest line: Oregon State by 2
Forecast at kickoff: Cloudy, about 60 degrees
Series history: Oregon State leads the all-time series 5-2, and the Beavers have won two in a row over Colorado.
